Method Summary
 void channelAdded(java.lang.String name, long channelID)

Method Detail

userCreated

public void userCreated(java.lang.String name,
                        long userID)
This method is invoked when a user successfully connects to the system. Note that user ID's are unique for this session but are not garuanteed to remain the same over multiple connection attempts.

Parameters:
name - The non-unique name of the user.
userID - The unqiue ID assigned to the user.

userRejected

public void userRejected(java.lang.String name,
                         long userlID)
This method is invoked when a user unsuccessfully attempts connection to the system. Note that user IDs are unique for this session but are not garuanteed to remain the same over multiple connection attempts.

Parameters:
name - The non-unique name of the rejected user.
userlID - The unqiue ID assined to the rejected user.

userDestroyed

public void userDestroyed(java.lang.String name,
                          long userID)
This method is invopked when a user disconnects from the system.

Parameters:
name - The non-unique name of the disconnected user.
userID - The unqiue ID of the disconnected user.

channelAdded

public void channelAdded(java.lang.String name,
                         long channelID)
This method is invoked when a new channel is created. Note that channel IDs are unique for this session but are not garuanteed to remain the same over multiple channel creation attempts.

Parameters:
name - The non-unqiue channel name of the newly create channel.
channelID - The unique channelID of the newly created channel.

channelRemoved

public void channelRemoved(long channelID)
This method is invoked when the channel is destroyed.

Parameters:
channelID - The unique channelID of the destroyed channel.
